nodes.text: Garlic was a type of food. In 0 ABY, rebel operative Luke Skywalker was repairing the Desert Jewel, the cryptologist Drusil Bephorin brought him bowls of noodles in a broth made from peanuts and garlic. As Skywalker attempted to use the Force to lift his fork from the bowl, he could smell the garlic and peanuts of the broth. However, he became distracted by the yelling of the human Nakari Kelen and dropped the fork, spilling the broth all over himself. In 34 ABY, the snack food Galma Garlic Puffed Cheese Chips, which contained garlic, was sold at Jat Kaa's Coolers in the settlement Black Spire Outpost on the world of Batuu.

Garlic first appeared in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 novel Heir to the Jedi. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, garlic was introduced in the 1993 reference book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, written by Bob Carrau.
